category.name: wcf.jcoins.statement
category.item: {if $statement->getObject()->getTitle()}Your Lexicon entry “{$statement->getObject()->getTitle()}” was published.{else}A Lexicon entry of yours was published, which was deleted in the meantime.{/if}
